name: Red Flood
description:
Red Flood is an alternate history mod for the Grand Strategy game Hearts of Iron IV about a prolonged crisis of modernity and the subsequent death of the old world. The mod is often praised for attention to detail in matters of historical accuracy, immersive writing, and a beautiful sense of artistic direction.

The design on r/place features a shared heart with its neighbor, The New Order, as the two mods are partners and frequently collaborate.
